title: rajrajhans.com
subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio and blog site developed using GatsbyJS, with a focus on speed, SEO and a convinient blog system.

title: WeTalk
subtitle: Basic Social Network
description: A Flask based basic social networking website developed using Python, with PostgreSQL used as the DBMS and deployed on Heroku.

title: SafePass
subtitle: Password Manager using ReactJS
description: A simple password management application developed using ReactJS.

title: React-Chat
subtitle: A messenger-like chat WebApp
description: Chat application developed using ReactJS and Firebase.

title: ResultScrape
subtitle: Web Scraping, Flask API, React Frontend
description: Using ScraPy to scrape a website, building an API for that data using Flask and a webapp for that data using ReactJS.

title: Analysis of Enron Scandal and POI Detection
subtitle: Fraud Detection using ML
description: Using machine learning techniques to predict employees who were a POI (Person of Interest) in the Enron Scandal using publicly available Enron Corpus dataset

title: Essay Editor Tool (API Integration)
subtitle: Identifies Spelling, Grammar, Punctuation mistakes
description: A tool to analyse your essay and run a spellcheck, grammar and punctuation check. Developed using  publicly available LanguageTool API in PHP.
